body:
After reading all five, I can say for certain that not only is this my favourite series on the site, but one of only a handful with that status that I haven't used to satisfy my more... carnal desires.

11/10 for the world building. As a writer I love the level of detail put into this.

10/10 for the plot. It's got me fuckin hooked. Still, somewhat concerned about that witch. Something about her feels off. Like in the case this weren't made just for the lewds, she would definitely fit the bill for the main antagonist.

10/10 for the damn story. It's fascinating how aspects of the past are slowly revealed, and the extras always make me laugh.

Overall, 31/30 is pretty damn good in my book.
how long you takes to finished this Doujins (I can't)
